title: Instant Match Drop
body: Okay I have been having this issue for a while now I'm in que for a game the match comes up and before i can get a chance to click the accept button it instantly drops and says I didn't accept the game.  So far i have lost about 15 LP due to this issue and it is becoming quite annoying.  Does anyone have any insight on to why this is happening?

replies.body: Your client might be lagging behind what's actually happening on our servers, possibly due to some weird hiccups in your network. Take a few minutes to go through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as we may just need to adjust some network settings here and there.
